job_description: รายละเอียดงานคิดค้นวิธีการผลิตใหม่ๆ เพื่อให้สามารถผลิตงานตามที่ลูกค้าต้องการทำรายงานผลบันทึกโครงการวิจัยต่างๆที่ได้มีการศึกษาวิจัยเพื่อเป็นประวัติอ้างอิงศึกษา/ปรับปรุงวิธีการผลิตที่มีอยู่เดิมเพื่อเพิ่มคุณภาพของสิ่งพิมพ์ ประสิทธิภาพ รวมทั้งกำหนดเป็นมาตรฐานในการทำงานจัดหาและ/ทดลองใช้วัตถุดิบใหม่ๆ เพื่อเพิ่มคุณภาพของงานพิมพ์ หรือลดต้นทุนในการผลิตหากโครงการนั้นๆมีผลที่จะต้องทำให้เกิดการเปลี่ยนแปลงกระบวนการผลิต จะต้องนำเสนอผลงานวิจัยนั้นๆให้ผู้เกี่ยวข้องวางแผนทำโครงการวิจัย ศึกษาเรื่องต่างๆเพื่อหาแนวทางแก้ไขหรือป้องกันปัญหาต่างๆที่จะเกิดขึ้นเป็นที่ปรึกษาด้านเทคนิค ความรู้ต่างๆให้แก่แผนกตรวจสอบคุณภาพและฝ่ายโรงงานพัฒนาสินค้าใหม่ๆที่ยังไม่เคยมีในตลาด จากทรัพยากรที่มีอยู่ หรือศึกษาและเสาะหาเครื่องมือ เครื่องจักรใหม่ๆจัดฝึกอบรมและให้ความรู้กับพนักงานคุณสมบัติอายุ 23-30 ปีวุฒิการศึกษาปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขาวิทยาศาสตร์การพิมพ์ เคมี หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์เกี่ยวกับงานวิจัยและพัฒนา 1 ปีมีความรู้และเข้าใจกระบวนการพิมพ์เป็นอย่างดีสวัสดิการเบี้ยขยันเครื่องแบบพนักงานเงินช่วยเหลือฌาปนกิจเงินกู้ยืมสำหรับพนักงาน,เงินกู้ฉุกเฉินเงินกองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพของขวัญเยี่ยมผู้ป่วยวันหยุดพักผ่อนประจำปีตรวจสุขภาพประจำปีงานเลี้ยงสังสรรค์ปีใหม่โบนัสประจำปีปรับเงินเดือนประจำปีประกันชีวิต,ประกันสุขภาพ, IPD, OPD อาหารราคาสวัสดิการKim Pai Ltd., Part.3706/1 Soi Rach-Utit 1, Pradoo 1 Road,Bangklow, Bangkholeam,Bangkok10120

job_title: Process Technologist (Contract 3 months)
job_description: RESPONSIBILITIES :Providing manufacturing process expertise to ensure that RB’s healthcare NPD’s and EPD’s are developed and delivered to plan using the technology transfer process. Leading supply in-sourcing projects or projects to move production between RB factories.Providing manufacturing expertise to maintain and improve the production of product utilizing existing processes and development of improved processes. Providing technical support for the manufacture of existing products (on a project basis)Conducting lab based/pilot scale work to enhance production processes.To support development and implementation of NPD/EPD’s. To ensure that supply has an input into the design of new products and formulations. To organize and lead industrial and lab/pilot trials as required during technology transfer and process development.To identify opportunities for continuous improvement in the manufacturing processes RB uses and to implement these with the related manufacturing site to improve cost, quality and customer service. To support the procurement team and R&D Health E&M in evaluation of major raw material opportunities and to assist when necessary with the industrial trials and validation required to add these new materials to product licenses.Identify and address technical issues on complex NPD/EPD projects where multiple aspects are involved and product requirements are locked down. Meeting deadlines that feed a product launch plan.Coordinating across business functions with supply sites, procurement, category marketing, R &D and regulatory teams.Flagging resource issues in a timely manner.Developing a concrete action plan based on project needs, resources, and/or issuesQUALIFICATION :Bachelor degree in relevant Scientific/Engineering/ Rubber technology/ ChemistryIn depth knowledge and experience of manufacturing technology.A minimum of 3 years FMCG experience is required (preferably medical device, latex or rubber based products).Knowledge of US FDA and global GMP standards and legislation is an advantage.Experience of trials, process development and validation is desirable.Fluency in English is essentialAbility to work in an international environment and flexible to travelResult-oriented, entrepreneurial, and self motivatingRB offers the right candidate the opportunity to sharpen his/her skills and to grow in a fast-growing dynamic multi-national company, and attractive remuneration packageAll applications will be treated with strict confidence. To apply, please submit your application together with a full CV, recent photo, and relevant documentation viaAPPLY NOWRB (Thailand) Co., Ltd./ (Durex)100, Moo 5, Bangna-Trad Rd. KM # 36, Bangsamak,Bangpakong, Chachuengsao 24180Direct number 033 599 642

job_title: Laboratory Technician (Pharmacology)
job_description: Mahidol Oxford Tropical Medicine Research Unit (MORU), is a well-established and highly productive research collaboration between the Faculty of Tropical Medicine, Mahidol University, the University of Oxford, and the Wellcome Trust (UK). The unit has been conducting research here for 40 years and is recognized as a world leader in tropical medicine research. Our main research interests are the pharmacology, epidemiology, diagnosis, pathophysiology and treatment of infectious diseases, which cause illness and deaths throughout this region.The Department of Clinical Pharmacologyis a part of MORU and focuses on quantifying drugs and their metabolites in biological fluids from clinical trials using LC-MS/MS, proteomic/metabolomic/lipidomic research, pharmacometric data analysis, and medicine quality research.Responsibilities:Responsibilities will include producing test medicines by accurate weighting and mixing of pharmaceutical ingredients, including pressing of tablets. Perform moisture determinations and water content analysis according to written instructions and procedures. Preparation of laboratory solutions, sample preparation and extraction, record keeping, routine maintenance of laboratory equipment, and handling other duties as assigned. To assist and use Raman and Near-Infrared instruments, and LC-MS in the analysis of pharmaceutical and clinical samples.Preferred qualifications and experience:Thai nationality with Bachelor degree in sciences or related fields.Previous experience in proteomic/metabolomic/lipidomic research, and/or medicine quality research is not essential but an advantage.Previous experience working in an analytical or pharmacology laboratory is not essential but an advantage.The successful candidate will be calm, patient and able to maintain focus and concentration during analysis of large sample batches.The successful candidate should be able to work responsibly according to written English instructions (SOP’s) either alone or in a team and can appreciate the importance of being precise during analysis and have good attention to details. The Department of Clinical Pharmacology is an international team and the working language in the laboratory is English. The candidate must be able to communicate effectively in Thai and English.Please apply in writing, stating qualifications and experience to Prof. Joel Tarning at MORU, Faculty of Tropical Medicine, Mahidol UniversityApplications close on 30 June 2020Click'Apply Now' below

job_description: 【Job description】Production operationLaunching a commercial plant, with the objective of enabling the mass production and stable supply of structural proteinsDetermining optimal conditions for fermentation and purification processes used in the volume production of structural proteinsManaging production line operatorsSharing technology and knowhow regarding structural protein production with other licensed plantsShift work is required【Job experience】More than 3 years’ experience in the fermentation, food, chemical, or pharmaceutical industriesas aproduction operation【Basic qualification】A sense of engagement and responsibility towards Spiber’s projectsThe ability to commit to the team's mission over individual interestsThe capacity for flexibility in the pursuit of maximizing the team’s performance; willingness to step outside individual areas of specializationAn appreciation for new experiences and challengesA person who can deliver our company culture and the right image togetherAbility to work under pressure and in a reactive environment with constant change【Requirements】Bachelor's degree in Electrical / Mechanical / Biotechnology / ChemicalMinimum 3 years of experience in the fermentation, food, chemical, or pharmaceutical industriesas aproduction operationOwn car driving license is a must (No car service)English: business conversational level (TOEIC examination score is over 740)【Preferred experience, skills or knowledge】Experience related to process development or manufacturing in the food, chemicals, or pharmaceutical industries for more than 3 years and/or set up the new factory (establish new business)Experience related systematic work (5S, 4M (work standardization), ISO 9001/ ISO 14000)【Number of position】4 positions【Location】Eastern Seaboard Industrial Estate in Rayong, Thailand【Start date】Around October 2020【Salary system】Salary: Approximate range30,000-70,000 baht/month (No bonuses nor allowances)Our company uses a self-​declaration salary system, in which each member decides their own salary and the salary is disclosed to all company members(Please check the way of thinking about salary at Spiber HP (https://www.spiber.jp/en/join/)).【Overtime pay】Provided【Probation period】119 days【Work hours】8 hours per day, 40 hours per week,Shift work is required.【Holidays】2 days off per week【Paid vacation】12 days per year【Social insurance】Standard social insurance including unemployment insurance, worker’s accident insurance, health insurance, and pension【Employee benefits】Employee cafeteria (after the construction of the plant is completed)

job_description: สำหรับบริษัท :PPP Green Complex Co., Ltd.(ปฏิบัติงาน ณ อ.บางสะพานน้อย จ.ประจวบคีรีขันธ์)หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ :วางแผนและติดตาม กระบวนการ การควบคุมและการประกันคุณภาพ วัตถุดิบ ผลิตภัณฑ์ระหว่างการผลิต และผลิตภัณฑ์พร้อมจำหน่าย จากกระบวนการผลิตน้ำมันปาล์มดิบ น้ำมันปาล์มบริโภค ไบโอดีเซล กลีเซอรีน เป็นต้น เพื่อให้มั่นใจได้ว่าผลิตภัณฑ์ที่จำหน่ายให้กับลูกค้ามีคุณภาพเป็นไปตามกำหนดของบริษัท ลูกค้า และข้อกฎหมายวางแผนและติดตามการควบคุมคุณภาพของน้ำดิบ น้ำผ่านการบำบัด น้ำในBoiler และน้ำทิ้งภายในโรงงาน ให้เป็นไปตามกฎหมายวางแผนและติดตาม กระบวนการสอบเทียบและบำรุงรักษาเครื่องมือวัดในห้องปฏิบัติการ ให้เป็นไปตามแผน มีประสิทธิภาพและเพียงพอต่อการใช้งานจัดทำ และ ทบทวน ข้อกำหนดของ วัตถุดิบ บรรจุภัณฑ์ ผลิตภัณฑ์ระหว่างการผลิต และ ผลิตภัณฑ์ พร้อมจำหน่ายของบริษัทวางแผน พัฒนา ติดตาม กระบวนการควบคุม และประกันคุณภาพ ภายในห้องปฏิบัติการให้มีประสิทธิภาพ ประสิทธิผล และสอดคล้องตามมาตรฐานสากลส่งเสริม และ ติดตามให้มีการปฏิบัติงานในห้องปฏิบัติการด้วยความปลอดภัย และ เป็นไปตามระเบียบของบริษัทบริหารจัดการบุคลากรให้เพียงพอต่อการปฏิบัติงาน และพัฒนาให้มีความรู้ ทักษะ และความชำนาญในงานจัดทำ และ บริหารงบประมาณของห้องปฏิบัติการให้เป็นไปอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพงานอื่นๆที่ได้รับมอบหมายคุณสมบัติ :เพศชาย/หญิง อายุ 30 ปีขึ้นไปปริญญาตรี สาขา เคมี วิทยาศาสตร์เคมี ปิโตรเคมีใช้MS-Office ได้ดี มีประสบการณ์       ด้านงานประกันหรือควบคุมคุณภาพ ไม่น้อยกว่า 5 ปี และ      ด้านบริหารงานในตำแหน่งผู้จัดการส่วนประกันคุณภาพ(Lab) ไม่น้อยกว่า 3 ปีมีความรู้ และ สามารถประยุกต์ใช้ ระบบบริหารคุณภาพ และ มาตรฐานในระดับสากล ได้แก่ISO/IEC 17025, ISO9001, ISO 14001 และ GMPPTG Energy Public Company Limited90 CW Tower, Tower A,33rd Floor, Ratchadaphisek Road,Huaykwang, Bangkok 10310Tel:02-168-3377, 02-168-3388ต่อ 747www.ptgenergy.co.th

job_description: คุณสมบัติชาย/หญิงวุฒิปริญญาตรี วิทยาศาสตร์สาขาเทคโนโลยีการอาหารหรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์ในงานควบคุมกระบวนการผลิตสารปรุงแต่งอาหาร (Seasoning) ในโรงงานอุตสาหกรรมอาหารอย่างน้อย 2-3 ปีมีความรู้และสามารถประยุกต์ใช้ ระบบมาตรฐานคุณภาพต่างๆ ได้แก่ ISO 9001, FSSC 22000, BRC, GMP/HACCPมีความสามารถในการสื่อสารโดยใช้ภาษาอังกฤษสวัสดิการกองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ ประกันสังคม ประกันชีวิตโบนัสเบี้ยขยันรถรับส่งตรวจสุขภาพประจำปีฝึกอบรมความรู้ด้านต่างๆวันหยุดพักผ่อนประจำปีกิจกรรมภายในบริษัท เช่น กีฬาสี ทำบุญบริษัท งานเลี้ยงสังสรรค์ประจำปี ฯลฯปรับเงินเดือนประจำปีเงินขวัญถุงงานแต่งของรับขวัญบุตรแรกเกิดเงินช่วยเจ้าภาพงานศพอื่นๆบริษัทเปิดทำการวันจันทร์-ศุกร์ (หยุดเสาร์-อาทิตย์)ท่านที่สนใจ โปรดส่งใบสมัครงานพร้อมประวัติย่อ ที่Apply Now  หรือส่งไปรษณีย์ที่ ฝ่ายทรัพยากรบุคคล บริษัท อดินพ จำกัด21 ซอยบางบอน3 ซอย12 แขวงหลักสอง เขตบางแคกรุงเทพ 10160 หรือดูข้อมูลเพิ่มเติมที่เว็บไซด์www.adinop.co.thหรือโทร.0-2445-5022 ต่อ 2020,2204

job_description: Purpose of Job:To develop color of various global projects (Key account customers) to meet the target quality requirement and to be on time of development.This job function also involve the coordinate with Clariant affiliate for formulation transfer.Roles & ResponsibilityResponse to do Bill of material (BOM) of TAR.PrepareBar code Label ,Presentation card,Standard chips ,Standard sample ,Standard library physical,Standard library in I-match,Standard library in I-matchProvide and take care sample in sample areaProvide standard library of color matching.Response to provide master batch sample for Sales Personnel as requestTakes care and maintains all equipment used in performing the daily job; ; performs theFormal physical cleaning of such equipment to ensure that they are in good working condition.Performs other related duties of a similar type at a similar level.RequiredDiploma or bachelor’s degree in Polymer, Chemical or color scienceMinimum 3 year of Colour matching in processBasic background of pigment and polymerGood Visual color perception, Good color sensesAbility to work independently.Familiar with SAP program and Computer literacy.

job_description: Role Summary :We are looking for a dynamic, flexible and self-motivated individual for an exciting opportunity in R&DOperations Health Team based in RB Bangpakong to handle responsibility of assisting the team inR&D development activities primarily focusing on Stability Management. Role requires individual withminimum education qualification degree in science background, may or may not have any industrialexperience.Responsibility :1.To support the stability management activities like equipment’smaintenance and recordkeeping.2.To support project coordinators/leads in planning, initiating and maintaining ongoing stability studies3.To update and maintain all the relevant logs and record file in compliance to site SOPs4.To ensure frequent calibrations and maintenance of storage cabinets and other equipment as per site SOP requirements5.To ensure and support team in preparing for internal and external audits with respect to stability management logs and records6.To support project leads in conducting development trials Maintaining and updating healthcare database systems as appropriate.7.To be responsible for personnel and colleagues health & safety. job_title: Regional Technical Manager - Animal Feed Nutrition
job_description: Regional Technical Manager - Animal Feed - Animal Health - Animal Nutrition - Bangkok - USA International Company - Up To 250,000 - Baht A Month Plus Bonuses And Benefits Regional Technical Manager - Animal Feed / Animal Health / Animal Nutrition / Technical Sales ServiceInternational Animal Feed Manufacturer - USAUp to 250,000 BAHT A MONTH PLUS BENEFITS & BONUSES depending upon skills and experienceThe Client My client is an international Animal Feed manufacturer and are pioneers in the research, development and production of Animal Feed and Animal Nutrition based products. With their HQ based in the USA they have manufacturing and sales based in Thailand The Role Regional Technical Manager for Animal Feed, Animal Health and Animal Nutrition will create relationships with Farmers to support growth for their product portfolio. Working with the Sales team to visit farms, livestock and farmers. Regional Technical Manager will advise how to best balance nutrition for their livestock. Actively work with Sales Teams in the region to identify commercial opportunitiesDistributor management and technical consultancy across the regionUpdate on all nutritional facts related to Animal Feed and Animal HealthProactively meet farmers and their livestock and provide technical assessmentsPromote core products following livestock assessment and evaluationDrive nutritional benefits to farmers and livestock producersThe Person**Thai OR Expat** with a strong background in Animal Feed Nutrition****Bachelor's degree required, Veterinary medicine, Food Nutrition, Animal Science (BSc, MSc)10 years technical experience within animal feed / nutrition industry (nutrition/genetic/pharma)Selling skills as well as a knowledge of technical science in products5 + years working knowledge of farm & livestock managementIf you have any further queries please call Paul on 02 107 2884 OR Email pcoles @ argyllscott . co thKEYWORDS - ANIMAL FEED, ANIMAL SCIENCE, NUTRITION, HEALTH, FEED ADDITIVES, RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT, PLANNING, STRATEGY, DEMAND, FORECAST, SALES, BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT, MARKETING, TECHNICAL, TECHNICAL SERVICE, TECHNICAL SCIENCE, FARM, LIVESTOCKArgyll Scott Asia is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.

job_title: Quality Control Staff – Chemistry Laboratory
job_description: Job Location:AyutthayaThe opportunity:BioNet is now looking for highly motivated and talented individuals for Quality Control team.Job Summary:Qualitative and quantitative Physico-chemical tests of vaccines and related products for raw materials, packaging materials, utility systems, optimization of chemical test to support R&D vaccines, sampling of water, raw material, packaging materials test method validation and verification and other jobs assigned by superior.Ideal candidate:Bachelor’s degree in Chemistry, or related fields or experience in chemistry laboratory .Good knowledge of GMP/GLP practices/ Biosafety.Ability to correctly analyze, interpret and apply technical data towards practical actions and outcomes.Strong ability to trouble shoot and optimize analytical methods; able to achieve problem resolution using scientific rational with minimal supervision.Ability to learn new method and techniques, perform multiple tasks simultaneously, keep accurate records, follow instruction and comply with company policies.Fluent in both written and spoken English.Ability to use computer programs for analytical results.About BioNet-Asia Co., LtdBioNet-Asia is a vaccine company with fully integrated operation from research to manufacturing and distribution. For the last 15 years, the company has been focusing on biotech innovation and global market access. BioNet has successfully built many partnerships leading to the supply of hundred millions doses of vaccines every year worldwide.To Apply :Please submit your resume in MS Word with recent photo stating present and expected salary by click "Apply Now"Human Resources DepartmentBioNet-Asia Co., Ltd.  Plant:Hi-Tech Industrial Estate, 81 Moo 1,Baan-Lane,Bang Pa-In,Ayuttaya 13160 ThailandWebsite:www.bionet-asia.com*All applications will be accepted by mail attached in MS.Word only.

job_title: NPD  Specialist / Chef
job_description: Title: NPD Specialist The Client: An International well know ingredient company. The Role:Work Closely to the Research and Development team to develop new product concepts to match with clients requirementsMake sure that all products achieved in a timely manner and suitable in flavor profile and appeal for the target consumer. Follow and research food trends across the region to work closely with consumer insights, marketing, and sensory.Handle training and presentations to the internal department on culinary and food trends.Be the representative of the company on the events and show. The person expected to interact with other culinary teams globally to share culinary ways of working and knowledge The Person:Must have strong professional chefs background.3-4 years of working experienceMust have good awareness of product/category value chain and product/process design aspects in the relevant field.Must have very good communication and networking skillsMust demonstrate passion and enthusiasm in creation of new products and ideas and should show quality obsession.Must show ability to work in a multi-functional and multi-cultural environment Argyll Scott Asia is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.

job_title: Superintendent - Construction, Tanks /Chonburi 2 Positions / Refinery/Oil&Gas/
job_responsibilities: ["Fircroftis now enhancing their coverage to focus more on permanent Recruitment and Personnel Solution service. Now we're looking forSuperintendent - Construction,Tanksas detail below;Location: ChonburiCondition: ContractResponsibilitiesResponsible for managing all site construction activities and supervising field personnel as required to ensure adherence to international standards, agreed budget, schedule and construction sequence. Responsible for supervising construction activities of Subcontractor trades personnel related to a discipline.Maintains the highest quality standards while administering good construction safety practices with all on-site activities.Ensure that all company employees and contractors are adhering to the company Health, Safety, and Environmental excellence policy.Promote job site safety, encourages safe work practices and rectifies job site hazards immediately. Regularly participate in HSE meetings, toolbox talks, and daily jobsite walks.Direct all field personnel including those of construction contractors to achieve completion of the project on schedule, with quality workmanship that conforms to original plans and specifications.Ensure that each reporting supervisor is capable of performing their allotted scope of work.Contribute to construction schedule and 6-weeks look-ahead, understand the project plans and specifications, identify and solve problems, order materials and schedulesinspections as necessary throughout the process. Maintain positive working relationship with customers, contractors, suppliers and other employees.Serve as a coach and mentor for subordinates and identify construction Supervisors with capacity to be promoted to Superintendent level.Implement standardized construction work processes, procedures, manuals and systems and create a system of control in each specific area.Lead, motivate, communicate with, develop, appraise and performance manage staff to ensure that staff are fully motivated to achieve best performance to meet the project and company’s needs. Ensure that all supervisors understand the construction KPI’s and their personal KPI’s, and strive to achieve these.Understands the systems turnover plan and sequence and ensures that the work is performed accordingly.Has responsibility to take decisions relating to allocated work scope to ensure completion to schedule, quality and budget"]

job_title: Site Interface Manager (Oil and Gas refinery/Petrochemical) / Opening for the package
job_responsibilities: ["Fircroftis now enhancing their coverage to focus more on permanent Recruitment and Personnel Solution service. Now we're looking forSite Interface Manageras detail below;Working Day: Monday - SaturdayJob DescriptionThe Site Interface Manager operationally reports to the Site Director and functionally reports to the JV Directorate Interface Manager.The Site Interface Manager has overall responsibility for implementation of the external interfaces management on the job site, by implementing at Site the project specific Interface Management Plan and work processes and the COREWORX database, capturing the external interface agreements, monitoring related progress and schedule requirements are maintained and identifying/ initiating any contract change notices that may arise out of the interface requirements. Furthermore the management of the Thai Regulatory Authority Permitting aspects for the Project in accordance with the Permit Master Plan also falls within the remit of Interface Management. Act as focal point for communication and coordination, and for the timely solving of external interface issues on the job site in compliance with Quality and HSSE requirements Site management of interface management systems and tools (e.g. Coreworx etc) required to effectively control external interfaces at SiteInterface management focal point support for the existing facilities for dealing with issues for the brownfield works with particular focus to tie-ins and shutdown period activities Maintain the Project Interface Register via the COREWORX database for site related external interface queries which shall define who, what, where and when the external interface issues are to be resolved Management oversight & involvement for Thai Regulatory Authority permitting for the Project with particular focus to site related aspectsReport the status of Site based interface issues and their close-out in the weekly Interface Management Dashboard Report and the Interface Management Monthly Progress Report Report the status of Site based interface issues and their close-out at the weekly Interface Management MeetingsMonitor changes, potential variations and risks to schedule and costs from Interface Issues / Items.Raise and notify these to the Project Directorship to initiate follow-up action accordinglyProvide guidance and support to the Site Director for optimum resolutions to internal interfaces issues (between JV partners) at the Site"]
job_qualifications: ['15+years experience in Oil and Gas refineryKnowledge of Site management of interface management systems and tools (e.g. Coreworx etc)Good command in English If you need the further information, please feel free tosubmit CV tovarisa.sangsuwan @ fircroft.com (อีเมล์ติดกันหมด)Fircroft Thailand.22nd Floor, 2202 Pacific Place II Building, 142Sukhumvit Road, Bangkok,, Thailand 1011002 653 2947 Ext 114 ']

job_responsibilities: ["Fircroftis now enhancing their coverage to focus more on permanent Recruitment and Personnel Solution service. Now we're looking forCivil Surveyoras detail below;Location: ChonburiCondition: ContractJob Responsibilities;Study the construction plan and the project plan and identify areas to be surveyed. job_responsibilities: ["Fircroftis now enhancing their coverage to focus more on permanent Recruitment and Personnel Solution service. job_responsibilities: ["Fircroftis now enhancing their coverage to focus more on permanent Recruitment and Personnel Solution service. Now we're looking forNitrogen Pumpman(Offshore)as detail below;Location: OffshoreThe Pumpman is responsible for the safe and cost effective operation and maintenance of the facility's marine systems including cargo and ballast equipment in the pump rooms, inert gas system valves, crude oil washing machines (COW), bilge pumps, valves and associated equipment with minimal environmental impact in accordance with legislation, class, flag and the compliance assurance management system (CAMS).Implement planned and corrective maintenance on all pump room, cargo, ballast and inert gas system equipment offshore, in a safe and competent manner, to safeguard the availability and operating condition so that maximum compliance and production targets can be achieved.Implement statutory working practices and Health, Safety and Environmental Procedures and the Permit to Work System.Provides first line maintenance for cargo, ballast and inert gas equipment Set-up inert gas plant for safe operations and shut-down on completion Ensure effective operations of systems including deck pumproom watch duties during cargo offtake, crude transfer, ballast, COW and slop tank operationsManage anti-pollution equipment provision and procurementEssential Skills / "]

job_title: Deputy Program Manager – Bangkok, Thailand
job_responsibilities: ['SummaryTetra Tech, ES Inc., a subsidiary of Tetra Tech, dedicated to international development and to improving the energy sector of developing economies, is the implementer of the USAID Southeast Asia EDGE Hub program. The Deputy Program Manager will support the Program Manager in fulfilling his/her responsibilities, including, ensuring human resource objectives are met through recruiting, selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising, and reviewing job contributions; enforcing policies and procedures; preparing and completing action plans; implementing production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving problems; identifying trends; determining system improvements; and implementing change.Responsibilities include:Work closely with the technical staff and Program Manager (PM) to achieve defined project results, produce deliverables on schedule, and build successful partnerships with stakeholders, counterparts and the donor communityAssist the PM with day-to-day project management and quality control support to improve the overall responsiveness to USAIDManage the preparation and production of the project’s progress reports, workplans and other contractual deliverablesSupervise the project’s crosscutting staff and related activities including training, monitoring and evaluation, communications, gender integration, and environmental compliance Assist the PM and home office staff on work-planning, activity design, scheduling and implementation, drafting technical justifications for USAID approvals, reporting and budgeting Coordinate with the home office on the sourcing, recruiting, hiring, and deployment and onboarding of staff, consultants and subcontractorsMaintain and update the project budget to mitigate cost overrunsManage all operational aspects of the program, includingfinancial,administrative, communications, contractsand human resources personnel in consultation with the PM Supervise administrativestaffand oversee the recruitment, hiring and onboarding process in coordination with the home officeDevelop andmaintain manuals based on corporate policies such as the operations, employee manual and emergency response planProvide reports to thehome office onestimated costs to complete the program, potential risks to successful implementation, and monthly accrual reports Review programoffice bank records for accuracy and compliance withthe USFederal Acquisition Regulations (FAR), USAID regulations and home office guidelines Liaise withUSAIDto resolve invoicing, contractual, and operationalissuesParticipate in and respond to the US government during audits and financial reviewsAddress complex international tax and VAT filing issuesEnsure that program deliverables are submitted to the Development Experience Clearinghouse (DEC), per the contract’s requirementsEnsure the program’s compliance with USAID regulations and the firm’s corporate policiesServe as an acting Program Manager (PM) in the absence of the PMPerform other related duties as assigned']
job_qualifications: ['s:Minimum 8 years of professional experience in management and the energy sectorAt least 3 years of experience working in Asia, preferably Southeast Asia and 3 years of experience working with the U.S. Government, preferably USAID. A Bachelor’s degree or higher in the energy field, including engineering, policy, legal, finance, economics, and/or other related field. A Master’s degree strongly preferred. Supervisory experience in the international development industry, specifically with long-term field staff and short-term U.S., third country, and local experts Ability to establish strong working relationships with senior national and local government officials, the private sector and civil society Excellent knowledge of performance evaluation and change management principlesA proven record of excellent leadership, communication, and organizational skillsExcellent leadership skills including strategic thinking, decision-making, oral and written communications, ability to motivate and collaborate with others to achieve team goals Fluency in English is required with excellent writing and presentation skillsNative level fluency in written and spoken Thai is required.The ability to legally work in Thailand is required.We thank all applicants for their interest; however only those selected for an interview will be contacted. Tetra Tech is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. We invite resumes from all interested parties including women, minorities, veterans and persons with disabilities.Tetra Tech offers competitive salary and fringe benefits.All submissions and enquiries shall be sent by e-mail to Mark Dunn, Program Manager – Southeast Asia EDGE Hub atApply Now ']
job_description: SummaryTetra Tech, ES Inc., a subsidiary of Tetra Tech, dedicated to international development and to improving the energy sector of developing economies, is the implementer of the USAID Southeast Asia EDGE Hub program. The Deputy Program Manager will support the Program Manager in fulfilling his/her responsibilities, including, ensuring human resource objectives are met through recruiting, selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising, and reviewing job contributions; enforcing policies and procedures; preparing and completing action plans; implementing production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving problems; identifying trends; determining system improvements; and implementing change.Responsibilities include:Work closely with the technical staff and Program Manager (PM) to achieve defined project results, produce deliverables on schedule, and build successful partnerships with stakeholders, counterparts and the donor communityAssist the PM with day-to-day project management and quality control support to improve the overall responsiveness to USAIDManage the preparation and production of the project’s progress reports, workplans and other contractual deliverablesSupervise the project’s crosscutting staff and related activities including training, monitoring and evaluation, communications, gender integration, and environmental compliance Assist the PM and home office staff on work-planning, activity design, scheduling and implementation, drafting technical justifications for USAID approvals, reporting and budgeting Coordinate with the home office on the sourcing, recruiting, hiring, and deployment and onboarding of staff, consultants and subcontractorsMaintain and update the project budget to mitigate cost overrunsManage all operational aspects of the program, includingfinancial,administrative, communications, contractsand human resources personnel in consultation with the PM Supervise administrativestaffand oversee the recruitment, hiring and onboarding process in coordination with the home officeDevelop andmaintain manuals based on corporate policies such as the operations, employee manual and emergency response planProvide reports to thehome office onestimated costs to complete the program, potential risks to successful implementation, and monthly accrual reports Review programoffice bank records for accuracy and compliance withthe USFederal Acquisition Regulations (FAR), USAID regulations and home office guidelines Liaise withUSAIDto resolve invoicing, contractual, and operationalissuesParticipate in and respond to the US government during audits and financial reviewsAddress complex international tax and VAT filing issuesEnsure that program deliverables are submitted to the Development Experience Clearinghouse (DEC), per the contract’s requirementsEnsure the program’s compliance with USAID regulations and the firm’s corporate policiesServe as an acting Program Manager (PM) in the absence of the PMPerform other related duties as assignedQualifications:Minimum 8 years of professional experience in management and the energy sectorAt least 3 years of experience working in Asia, preferably Southeast Asia and 3 years of experience working with the U.S. Government, preferably USAID. A Bachelor’s degree or higher in the energy field, including engineering, policy, legal, finance, economics, and/or other related field. A Master’s degree strongly preferred. Supervisory experience in the international development industry, specifically with long-term field staff and short-term U.S., third country, and local experts Ability to establish strong working relationships with senior national and local government officials, the private sector and civil society Excellent knowledge of performance evaluation and change management principlesA proven record of excellent leadership, communication, and organizational skillsExcellent leadership skills including strategic thinking, decision-making, oral and written communications, ability to motivate and collaborate with others to achieve team goals Fluency in English is required with excellent writing and presentation skillsNative level fluency in written and spoken Thai is required.The ability to legally work in Thailand is required.We thank all applicants for their interest; however only those selected for an interview will be contacted. Tetra Tech is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. We invite resumes from all interested parties including women, minorities, veterans and persons with disabilities.Tetra Tech offers competitive salary and fringe benefits.All submissions and enquiries shall be sent by e-mail to Mark Dunn, Program Manager – Southeast Asia EDGE Hub atApply Now

job_title: Process Technologist (Contract 3 months)
job_description: RESPONSIBILITIES :Providing manufacturing process expertise to ensure that RB’s healthcare NPD’s and EPD’s are developed and delivered to plan using the technology transfer process. Leading supply in-sourcing projects or projects to move production between RB factories.Providing manufacturing expertise to maintain and improve the production of product utilizing existing processes and development of improved processes. Providing technical support for the manufacture of existing products (on a project basis)Conducting lab based/pilot scale work to enhance production processes.To support development and implementation of NPD/EPD’s. To ensure that supply has an input into the design of new products and formulations. To organize and lead industrial and lab/pilot trials as required during technology transfer and process development.To identify opportunities for continuous improvement in the manufacturing processes RB uses and to implement these with the related manufacturing site to improve cost, quality and customer service. To support the procurement team and R&D Health E&M in evaluation of major raw material opportunities and to assist when necessary with the industrial trials and validation required to add these new materials to product licenses.Identify and address technical issues on complex NPD/EPD projects where multiple aspects are involved and product requirements are locked down. Meeting deadlines that feed a product launch plan.Coordinating across business functions with supply sites, procurement, category marketing, R &D and regulatory teams.Flagging resource issues in a timely manner.Developing a concrete action plan based on project needs, resources, and/or issuesQUALIFICATION :Bachelor degree in relevant Scientific/Engineering/ Rubber technology/ ChemistryIn depth knowledge and experience of manufacturing technology.A minimum of 3 years FMCG experience is required (preferably medical device, latex or rubber based products).Knowledge of US FDA and global GMP standards and legislation is an advantage.Experience of trials, process development and validation is desirable.Fluency in English is essentialAbility to work in an international environment and flexible to travelResult-oriented, entrepreneurial, and self motivatingRB offers the right candidate the opportunity to sharpen his/her skills and to grow in a fast-growing dynamic multi-national company, and attractive remuneration packageAll applications will be treated with strict confidence. To apply, please submit your application together with a full CV, recent photo, and relevant documentation viaAPPLY NOWRB (Thailand) Co., Ltd./ (Durex)100, Moo 5, Bangna-Trad Rd. KM # 36, Bangsamak,Bangpakong, Chachuengsao 24180Direct number 033 599 642

job_title: Lab Technician (QA)
job_responsibilities: ['Lab Technician (QA)Job description:-Tests and reports bitumen products (Pen Grade, Polymer Modified Bitumen, Emulsion Bitumen, and Flintkote)for quality assurance (QA) against specification for plant production in Asia Pacific and Middle East region.-Manages and maintains good service of laboratory equipment which include internal and external calibration and preventive maintenance upon standards or laboratory requirement.-Works with bitumen and chemical, able to understand on product safety data sheet and able to comply with safety on the management of both the document and laboratory skills.-Supports and engages with both internal and external stakeholders on laboratory show case and training.-Supports on generate or manage technical data file, project data file with Microsoft Office and other basic computer/internet applications.-Supports on product logistic both internal handling and external shipment and logistic-Supports on laboratory safety activities together with other team members i.e. laboratory waste management, 5S, Laboratory safety improvement, etc.']
job_qualifications: [':-Thai Nationality-Bachelor’s degree in Chemical, Scientific or related field.-Minimum 3 years of experience in Chemical, Scientific, Laboratory or related field.-Basic communication in English (Writing, Reading, speaking and listening)-Computer literacy(Microsoft Office Program).-Knowledge in Bitumen will be advantage.-Able to work independent with minimum supervision.Location:BangkokWorking day:Monday – FridayContract:3 years contractFor more information.Contact: K.SuttipongTel: 02-678-1813 Ext. 2017 ']

job_title: QA Manager / (for Palm oil mill, refinery and bio-diesel plant จ.ประจวบคีรีขันธ์)/ผู้จัดการส่วนประกันคุณภาพ (Lab)
job_description: สำหรับบริษัท :PPP Green Complex Co., Ltd.(ปฏิบัติงาน ณ อ.บางสะพานน้อย จ.ประจวบคีรีขันธ์)หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ :วางแผนและติดตาม กระบวนการ การควบคุมและการประกันคุณภาพ วัตถุดิบ ผลิตภัณฑ์ระหว่างการผลิต และผลิตภัณฑ์พร้อมจำหน่าย จากกระบวนการผลิตน้ำมันปาล์มดิบ น้ำมันปาล์มบริโภค ไบโอดีเซล กลีเซอรีน เป็นต้น เพื่อให้มั่นใจได้ว่าผลิตภัณฑ์ที่จำหน่ายให้กับลูกค้ามีคุณภาพเป็นไปตามกำหนดของบริษัท ลูกค้า และข้อกฎหมายวางแผนและติดตามการควบคุมคุณภาพของน้ำดิบ น้ำผ่านการบำบัด น้ำในBoiler และน้ำทิ้งภายในโรงงาน ให้เป็นไปตามกฎหมายวางแผนและติดตาม กระบวนการสอบเทียบและบำรุงรักษาเครื่องมือวัดในห้องปฏิบัติการ ให้เป็นไปตามแผน มีประสิทธิภาพและเพียงพอต่อการใช้งานจัดทำ และ ทบทวน ข้อกำหนดของ วัตถุดิบ บรรจุภัณฑ์ ผลิตภัณฑ์ระหว่างการผลิต และ ผลิตภัณฑ์ พร้อมจำหน่ายของบริษัทวางแผน พัฒนา ติดตาม กระบวนการควบคุม และประกันคุณภาพ ภายในห้องปฏิบัติการให้มีประสิทธิภาพ ประสิทธิผล และสอดคล้องตามมาตรฐานสากลส่งเสริม และ ติดตามให้มีการปฏิบัติงานในห้องปฏิบัติการด้วยความปลอดภัย และ เป็นไปตามระเบียบของบริษัทบริหารจัดการบุคลากรให้เพียงพอต่อการปฏิบัติงาน และพัฒนาให้มีความรู้ ทักษะ และความชำนาญในงานจัดทำ และ บริหารงบประมาณของห้องปฏิบัติการให้เป็นไปอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพงานอื่นๆที่ได้รับมอบหมายคุณสมบัติ :เพศชาย/หญิง อายุ 30 ปีขึ้นไปปริญญาตรี สาขา เคมี วิทยาศาสตร์เคมี ปิโตรเคมีใช้MS-Office ได้ดี มีประสบการณ์       ด้านงานประกันหรือควบคุมคุณภาพ ไม่น้อยกว่า 5 ปี และ      ด้านบริหารงานในตำแหน่งผู้จัดการส่วนประกันคุณภาพ(Lab) ไม่น้อยกว่า 3 ปีมีความรู้ และ สามารถประยุกต์ใช้ ระบบบริหารคุณภาพ และ มาตรฐานในระดับสากล ได้แก่ISO/IEC 17025, ISO9001, ISO 14001 และ GMPPTG Energy Public Company Limited90 CW Tower, Tower A,33rd Floor, Ratchadaphisek Road,Huaykwang, Bangkok 10310Tel:02-168-3377, 02-168-3388ต่อ 747www.ptgenergy.co.th

job_title: Head of Research and Development  (Heavy Manufacturing), Pathumthani, Thailand
job_description: Salary: AttractiveAdditional Benefits:AttractiveCompany ProfileExecutive recruitment company Monroe Consulting Group Thailand is recruiting on behalf of a well-established raw material manufacturing company. Our respected client is seeking a talented research and development professional for the job of Head of Research and Development. The job is based in Bangkok.The successful candidate will investigate technology development, concept development and new product development, while driving improvements in existing productsJob SummaryResearch and development managers lead a team of employees in conducting research and development for an organization. His or her roles are to investigate technology development, concept development, and new product development, among other areas. Research and development teams work to improve existing products. They identify areas for improvement and how any changes might be conducted. Research and development managers oversee process and suggest recommendations to the organization's leaders.Job ResponsibilitiesParticipate in technology sensing and assessment activities for company’s strategic innovation.Work with department leadership and business team to assess new technology and prioritize resources for development.Lead multi-site, state of the art Materials Science Characterization Laboratories Identify and establish working relationships with external technology partners Hire, develop, and manage team members at distributed locations to maintain and grow functional capabilities/capacity to meet business needs.Direct and control the activities of multiple projects and personnel. Assists direct reports with setting and execution of goals & objectives and career development plans.Managing existing product portfolio by taking responsibilities across multiple departments, including product development, quality, sales and marketing, supply chain and logistics.Budget development and management. Help develop a budget for the plan and ensure that the team is working within that plan. Also, ensure that goals and objectives are being met.Lead problem solving and issue resolution especially as it relates to root cause analysis.Develop and validate new test methods for evaluating existing and new materials.Ensure compliance to Laboratory and R&D standards, policies, and guidelines.Identifying new products and solutions to meet market needs and grow market share.Winning customer acceptance of our products and solutions by communicating value propositions.Providing market analysis reports.Maintaining technical knowledge by attending educational seminars and conferences, researching and reading professional publications and online sources.Job RequirementsA master’s or doctorate degree is required, usually in Materials Science, Chemistry, Physics or Engineering major is preferred. Ph.D. degree will be advantage.Over 3 years R&D lab experience preferred Potential applicants must be qualified to lead a team. Must show superior problem-solving skills, as well as excellent leadership skills.Strong communication skills and strong ability to address multiple tasks.Possess analytical problem solving, creative thinking skills, excellent verbal/written communication and interpersonal skills.Provides accurate information keeping customer focus. Ensure laboratory compliance with all safety standards, practices, and requirements.Strong interest in technology and willingness to learn about products and customer needsINTERESTED? All applications will be treated in the strictest confidence. If you are a suitable match for this positionplease simply click theAPPLYbutton below and please ensurethat your CV is a WORD document and not a PDF

job_title: Regional Technical Manager - Animal Feed Nutrition
job_description: Regional Technical Manager - Animal Feed - Animal Health - Animal Nutrition - Bangkok - USA International Company - Up To 250,000 - Baht A Month Plus Bonuses And Benefits Regional Technical Manager - Animal Feed / Animal Health / Animal Nutrition / Technical Sales ServiceInternational Animal Feed Manufacturer - USAUp to 250,000 BAHT A MONTH PLUS BENEFITS & BONUSES depending upon skills and experienceThe Client My client is an international Animal Feed manufacturer and are pioneers in the research, development and production of Animal Feed and Animal Nutrition based products. With their HQ based in the USA they have manufacturing and sales based in Thailand The Role Regional Technical Manager for Animal Feed, Animal Health and Animal Nutrition will create relationships with Farmers to support growth for their product portfolio. Working with the Sales team to visit farms, livestock and farmers. Regional Technical Manager will advise how to best balance nutrition for their livestock. Actively work with Sales Teams in the region to identify commercial opportunitiesDistributor management and technical consultancy across the regionUpdate on all nutritional facts related to Animal Feed and Animal HealthProactively meet farmers and their livestock and provide technical assessmentsPromote core products following livestock assessment and evaluationDrive nutritional benefits to farmers and livestock producersThe Person**Thai OR Expat** with a strong background in Animal Feed Nutrition****Bachelor's degree required, Veterinary medicine, Food Nutrition, Animal Science (BSc, MSc)10 years technical experience within animal feed / nutrition industry (nutrition/genetic/pharma)Selling skills as well as a knowledge of technical science in products5 + years working knowledge of farm & livestock managementIf you have any further queries please call Paul on 02 107 2884 OR Email pcoles @ argyllscott . co thKEYWORDS - ANIMAL FEED, ANIMAL SCIENCE, NUTRITION, HEALTH, FEED ADDITIVES, RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT, PLANNING, STRATEGY, DEMAND, FORECAST, SALES, BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT, MARKETING, TECHNICAL, TECHNICAL SERVICE, TECHNICAL SCIENCE, FARM, LIVESTOCKArgyll Scott Asia is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.

job_title: NPD  Specialist / Chef
job_description: Title: NPD Specialist The Client: An International well know ingredient company. The Role:Work Closely to the Research and Development team to develop new product concepts to match with clients requirementsMake sure that all products achieved in a timely manner and suitable in flavor profile and appeal for the target consumer. Follow and research food trends across the region to work closely with consumer insights, marketing, and sensory.Handle training and presentations to the internal department on culinary and food trends.Be the representative of the company on the events and show. The person expected to interact with other culinary teams globally to share culinary ways of working and knowledge The Person:Must have strong professional chefs background.3-4 years of working experienceMust have good awareness of product/category value chain and product/process design aspects in the relevant field.Must have very good communication and networking skillsMust demonstrate passion and enthusiasm in creation of new products and ideas and should show quality obsession.Must show ability to work in a multi-functional and multi-cultural environment Argyll Scott Asia is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.

job_description: Job Description:Managing the Laboratory team according to available capacity.Managing the microbiological testing of products, including in-process samples/environmental/finished products.Managing chemical testing within the factory.Managing all equipment used in the laboratory, planning calibration/verification, and evaluating the results.Managing media, chemicals, and equipment for analysis purposes, and summarizing the details.Updating all references and standard methods used in the division and creating/updating work instructions.Conducting microbiological testing of food using both conventional and rapid methods.Preparing bacterial culture media and related apparatus.Accomplishing bacterial reference culture shelf life projects.Managing proficiency testing for all methods and evaluating the results.Summarizing the results of KPIs and preparing improvement action plans.Qualifications:Male/Female, Thai national, aged 30–40 years old.Bachelor's degree or higher in Microbiology/Chemistry/Biology/Science or related.At least 5 years' working experience in the laboratory field.Must be able to Korat plant.Able to work from Monday- Saturday.Experience in BRC, GMP, HACCP, ISO/IEC17025:2005.Computer literate.Good interpersonal and analytical skills.Good English skills.Experience from a poultry farm and manufacturing will be an advantage.

job_title: Warehousing & Distribution Manager
job_description: ROLES & RESPONSIBILITIES:Male / FemaleAt least 32 years of age.Bachelor's degree or higher in Food Science, Food Technology, Logistics management, Industry of Science or relate field.Minimum 5 -7 years experience in Warehousing, Logistics, and Transportation Management and Inventory in manufacturing company.Strong leadership, analytical, and people management skills.Strong inventory and data management.Self motivated, self starter and well organized.Good Communication skillsGood command of English both spoken and written.Excellent in computer and / or WMS/ERP program knowledge would be an advantage.QUALIFICATIONS:Develop and manage the Raw materials Warehouse, Finished Goods Warehouse and Transportation processes andarrangement to met KPI & Budget.Manages all activities concerned with warehousing and distributing of products.Responsible for the operation of the warehouse involving both incoming and outgoing.To organize an optimal storage following food quality, food safety and environmental standard.Resolve interruptions to the orderly flow of finished product, and for advising senior management on the status of these operations.Develop and Implement Warehousing Information Data Systems necessary to facilitate the efficient operation of the warehouse and meet corporate objectives, both current and future.To analyze Manage a domestic Transportation budget.To ensure on-time delivery and best practice costing.Aware of Delivery Cycle so as to plan for receiving shipment from factory to local warehouse.Provide monthly updates on project status and progress report on other process improvement initiatives.Interested candidates , please send your update CV with photoand portfolio to :Human Resource DepartmentNewly Weds Foods (Thailand) Limited909 Moo 15 Teparak Rd.,T. BangsaothongA.Bangsaothong, Samutprakarn 10570(66) (0) -2315 9047 Fax.(66) (0) -2313 1639

job_title: New Product Development Supervisor-Food Coating
job_description: QUALIFICATIONS:B. Sc. Degree in Food Science and Technology or Culinary Arts with 5-7 years of applicable experience, or an equivalent combination of education and experience is requiredThe employee must regularly taste, smell and feel food product of all types and possess the ability to discern subtle difference in taste, texture and aroma of a wide range of components.A good knowledge of organoleptic evaluation is a plus.Product development skills and a good understanding of the food industry, including ingredient supply, food processing techniques and equipment associated with seasoningsGood sensory abilities and experience with a wide range of flavors and tastesGood command of English both written and spokenGood computer skillsROLES & RESPONSIBILITIES:Creative blend development from concept generation to formulating new flavoring blend prototypes for a wide range product line focused on but not limited to poultry, seafood, snack and canned products Manage the assigned and delegated sample requests, and ensure the samples are correct and prepared in time and under safety for dispatch.Initiated the innovative product and international cuisine.Recommend appropriate production processes for new products in consultation with production and QCAct as a technical resource internally (QC, production, etc.) and to customers when required (advice, attending line trials etc.)Recommended procedural revisions relating to the operation of Product Development DepartmentInterested candidates , please send your update CV with photoand portfolio to :Human Resource DepartmentNewly Weds Foods (Thailand) Limited909 Moo 15 Teparak Rd.,T. BangsaothongA.Bangsaothong, Samutprakarn 10570(66) (0) -2315 9047 Fax.(66) (0) -2313 1639

job_title: Cluster Food Protection Specialist
job_description: At Tetra Pak we touch millions of lives every day, ensuring better nutrition and healthier lifestyles through safe packaging and food processing solutions. Guided by our global brand promise, PROTECTS WHAT´S GOOD, we strive to make a difference by protecting food, people and our futures. To do this we need more than smart technology. We need smart people too. People like you, who wants to work with people like us.Cluster Food Protection SpecialistThe role of this position is to provide aseptic performance support, advice, guidance and expertise in the areas of food safety and product quality to customers and internal to ensure the desired product quality levels are consistently achievedWhat you will doAs our new Cluster Food Protection Specialist, you willPerform escalated issue resolution and systematic troubleshooting in the areas of aseptic performance. Ensure the case is accurately investigated and findings are analysed according to problem solving methodology. Recommend actions for root cause eradication and horizontal prevention (lesson learned). Lead systematic feedback for aseptic performance issues, including communication to Central/platform.Promote and deliver aseptic performance support service products (Expert services). Provide expertise when delivering Food Protection Services.Actively promote and deliver trainings to customers and internal, focusing on the areas of aseptic performance support (Training services).Support the aseptic and microbiological validation trials during Installation to Performance (ItP) or commissioning of new products, to ensure desired levels of end-product quality.Support the aseptic performance data collection and regular data analysis, benchmarking.Deploy APS procedures and guidelines as well as best practices.Proactively keep self-updated on food technology, food science and food safety standards, including local legislation and regulatory guidelinesWho you areWe believe the successful candidate will haveMinimum Bachelor Degree from reputable university majoring in Food Technology, Dairy Technology, Microbiology, Biotechnology, Food Engineering or Food Science, with very satisfactory index of academic achievementsMinimum 2-year experience working as supervisor or manager in Quality Assurance/Quality Control/Quality System/Laboratory/Product Development or Plant Production either in food (aseptic/chilled) industries, microbiological laboratory, chemical cleaning company or food-auditor-company. Experience in delivering training Experience in ISO 22000 Food Safety Management System or HACCP. Experience in leading a team is preferred. Updated with recent journals or articles related to food/dairy technology, aseptic technology, food processing, microbiology and biotechnology.Deep knowledge in Quality Assurance, Quality Control, Quality System (HACCP, ISO) and Microbiology.Sufficient knowledge in aseptic filling, processing/dairy technology, UHT treatment and pre-processing will provide advantages.Excellent communication / Presentation skills / Good inter-personal skills Able and willing to travel 50-80% of total time, including travel to other cities, other countries/markets within and outside the cluster.Able to work under pressure Willing to work overtime including during weekends (if required due to urgency).Customer facing experience is preferred Spoken and written English and Thai are mandatory. We offer youExtensive opportunity for career growth within the organization Highly skilled and committed colleagues, a challenging and high paced work environmentFlexible working arrangement Equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. Our people are all equally talented in unique ways: we come from diverse traditions, personal experiences and points of view.Would you like to start your career "in good company"?If you are inspired to contribute to securing commercial opportunities within an international company that offers attractive employment conditions and find collaborating with a diverse range of talented colleagues appealing, feel free to apply thru this post as soon as possible.To know more about the position, contact Wicha Sribanyen at https://www.linkedin.com/in/wicha-sribanyen

job_qualifications: ['Bachelor’s degree or higher in Food Science and TechnologyAt least 5 years working experience in technical areas (QC/QA, Production, R&D) in food factoryWorking experience in varieties of food categories is preferable.Experience in being as internal auditor for management systems is preferableWorking experience in companies that implemented and certified food safety and quality management systems and getting involved with this system is preferableAchieve ISO 22000/FSSC 22000 and ISO 9001 Registered Lead Auditor course is preferable Good command in EnglishCommunication skill, persuasion skill and service mindInterested candidate, please submit a full detail resume (by word or PDF format only) including current salary and expected salary with a recent photograph by click "Apply Now"by specify the "Auditor " accordingly or you can apply in person at SGS (Thailand) Limited.SGS (Thailand) Limited100 Nanglinchee ChongnonseeYannawa Bangkok 10120Tel. 02-678-1813 ext 1117 Fax : 02-678-1541 ']

job_title: R&D Supervisor - Food Supplement /นักวิจัยและพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์อาหารเสริมอาวุโส
job_description: หน้าที่และรายละเอียดของงานวิจัย พัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์ใหม่ และปรับปรุงผลิตภัณฑ์อาหารเสริม อย่างต่อเนื่องตามความต้องการของลูกค้าและตลาดปรับปรุงและลดต้นทุนสินค้าที่มีอยู่ให้มีต้นทุนต่ำโดยที่ไม่ให้คุณภาพลดลงสามารถประเมินต้นทุนของผลิตภัณฑ์ได้จัดทำสูตร ส่วนประกอบของผลิตภัณฑ์ใหม่จัดทำสเปคในขั้นตอนของการผลิตอาหารเสริมจัดทำเอกสาร Finished product specification ทั้งภาษาไทยและภาษาอังกฤษจัดทำเอกสารระบบคุณภาพมาตรฐาน GMP / HACCP และ/หรือเอกสารการปฏิบัติงานที่เกี่ยวข้องจัดทำเอกสารสำหรับขออนุญาตกับหน่วยงานราชการในการนำผลิตภัณฑ์ออกจำหน่ายอย่างถูกกฎหมาย (การขึ้นทะเบียนผลิตภัณฑ์อาหาร และอื่น ๆ)ดูแล ทดสอบ และตรวจสอบการผลิตสินค้า จัดทำ Shelf Life, ความคงสภาพของผลิตภัณฑ์ตรวจสอบ Specification วัตถุดิบใหม่ทดสอบคุณภาพของวัสดุใหม่โดยการประสานงานกับฝ่ายจัดซื้อร่วมทดสอบและแก้ปัญหากับฝ่ายควบคุมคุณภาพในกรณีที่ผลิตภัณฑ์และวัตถุดิบมีปัญหาให้ความช่วยเหลือด้านเทคนิคการผลิตแก่หน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้องติดต่อประสานงานกับ Supplier วัตถุดิบ, ฝ่ายขาย, ลูกค้า และบุคคลทั่วไปนำเสนอผลิตภัณฑ์ของบริษัทให้กับลูกค้าได้มีหน้าที่รับผิดชอบในการปฏิบัติติงานภายใต้คำสั่งของผู้บังคับบัญชาคุณสมบัติเพศชาย - หญิง อายุ 22-35 ปี บุคลิกภาพดีประสบการณ์ 3 ปี ขึ้นไปวุฒิการศึกษาปริญญาตรี คณะวิทยาศาสตร์อาหาร และเทคโนโลยีทางอาหาร หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์การทำงานด้านระบบคุณภาพมาตรฐาน GMP / HACCP จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษมีประสบการณ์ด้านวิจัยและพัฒนา เกี่ยวกับผลิตภัณฑ์อาหารเสริม จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษมีความรู้เรื่องวัตถุดิบ/สาร และสูตรต้นตำรับมาตราฐานทั่วไปมีประสบการณ์ในการติดต่อ ทำงานร่วมกับผู้จัดจำหน่ายวัตถุดิบมีความรู้ด้านกฎหมายเกี่ยวกับการขึ้นทะเบียนผลิตภัณฑ์อาหาร ตามกฎหมาย และอื่นๆใช้คอมพิวเตอร์โปรแกรม Microsoft Word, Excel ได้มีความคิดสร้างสรรค์ในงานที่ดีเยี่ยมมีความซื่อสัตย์ มีความรับผิดชอบสูง และมีความกระตือรือร้นมีความสามารถในการสื่อสาร และมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดีมีทัศนคติที่ดี มีภาวะความเป็นผู้นำ และเป็นผู้ที่มีวินัยไม่ยึดติดกับตัวตนของตนเอง รับฟังความคิด ยอมรับแนวทางของผู้อื่น และทำงานเป็นทีมได้ดีสามารถทำงานต่อภาวะแรงกดดันได้สวัสดิการทำงาน วันจันทร์-เสาร์ เวลา 08.00-17.00 น.โบนัสประจำปี (ตามผลประกอบการบริษัทฯ)ปรับเงินเดือนประจำปี (ตามผลประกอบการบริษัทฯ)ค่ารางวัลการขาย/คอมมิชชั่น (เฉพาะฝ่ายขาย)ประกันสังคมประกันอุบัติเหตุรถรับส่งพนักงาน (เอื้ออาทร ตลาดนิคม)เครื่องแบบพนักงานเงินช่วยเหลือในกรณีต่าง ๆงานเลี้ยงสังสรรค์ประจำปีตรวจสุขภาพประจำปีค่าส่วนลดราคาสำหรับพนักงานCareer Path (โอกาสก้าวหน้าในตำแหน่งงาน)การฝึกอบรมพัฒนาความสามารถวันหยุดนักขัตฤกษ์ อย่างน้อย 13 วันต่อปีวันหยุดพักผ่อนประจำปี (พักร้อน) สูงสุด 15 วันต่อปีวันลากิจ สูงสุด 7 วันต่อปี

job_description: PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIESResponsible for the Division Sales target annuallySPECIFIC RESPONSIBILITIESResponsible for sales and marketing strategies, planning and sales campaign to build strong effective and productive of sales team target result and relationship with key accounts.To ensure all reports are accurate and on-time e.g. TH Breakdown, Action Plan or revised sales & marketing strategy once unachieved result has been found, Sales Momnthly Report.To drive SGS products to clients in such a way to ensure that all required team conversion rates for proposals and contracts are met and to ensure that all proposals are followed up in a manner that ensures that our services exceeds customer’s expectations.To report back to management of trends in demand for products and movements in the market including reporting on problems incurred in selling identified products.Aim at achieving sound of customer satisfaction for sale function.To handle international sales/project effectively, respond, manage, and coordinate with technical issue to service inquiry timely and accurately.To initiate idea for market events, so as to expand sales for desired zone and products.Ensure all sales team targets and contract team targets per month are achieved.QUALIFICATIONSBachelor degree in Food Science, FoodEngineeringor related field.1-3 years in sales experiencesGood command of spoken and written EnglishAble to coordinate with team.Able to work independently and to coordinate several activities simultaneouslyAble to interact with all levels of management, suppliers and clientsGood communication, negotiation and interpersonal skillsActs quickly and decisively; able to make tough callsWorks well under pressure, challenges statusInterested candidate, please submit a full detail resume (by word or PDF format only) including current salary and expected salary with a recent photograph viaAPPLY NOWSGS (Thailand) Limited100 Nanglinchee Chongnonsee Yannawa Bangkok 10120Tel. 02-678-1813 ext 1117 (K.Jidapa)

job_title: QA/QC supervisor/หัวหน้าหน่วยประกันคุณภาพ/ควบคุมคุณภาพ
job_description: ความรับผิดชอบ1. ติดตามประสิทธิภาพของการควบคุมคุณภาพวัตถุดิบ กระบวนการผลิตและสินค้าให้มีคุณภาพสอดคล้องตามมาตรฐานและข้อกำหนดของผลิตภัณฑ์2. วางแผนและติดตามกระบวนการประกันคุณภาพสินค้า และการผลิตสินค้าให้มีประสิทธิภาพ3. ให้มีการสนับสนุนและดำเนินกิจกรรมต่างๆ เพื่อตำรงไว้ซึ่งการรับรองตามมาตรฐาน ISO 9001, ISO 1400, GMP และ HACCP4. ประสานงานและดำเนินกิจกรรมเกี่ยวกับระบบมาตรฐานหรือข้อกำหนดทางกฎหมายเพื่อให้สามารถผลิตสินค้าได้ตรงตามความต้องการของลูกค้าและสอดคล้องกับหลักเกณฑ์ทางกฎหมาย5. จัดสรรอัตรากำลังคนและประเมินผลการปฏิบัติงานของพนักงานในแผนก QA/QC6. พัฒนาและสนับสนุนบุคคลากรในแผนกให้ได้รับการอบรมและมีความรู้ความสามารถทั้งในด้านงานควบคุมคุณภาพและระบบมาตรฐานที่เกี่ยวข้อง7. ติดต่อประสานงานกับลูกค้าและหน่วยราชการที่เกี่ยวข้องเพื่อให้ข้อมูลด้านคุณภาพสินค้าและจัดการข้อร้องเรียนต่างๆ8. ตรวจสอบรายงานและติดตามการดำเนินการแก้ไขเรื่องปัญหาคุณภาพสินค้าและข้อร้องเรียนประจำปี9. จัดสรรงบประมาณและอุปกรณ์เครื่องมือให้เพียงพอเพื่อให้สามารถรองรับการทำงานได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ10. ปฏิบัติงานอื่นๆตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายคุณสมบัติ1. จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขา เคมี ,จุลชีววิทยา , food Science, Food Technology2. มีประสบการณ์ในการทำงานอย่างน้อย 2 ปี ขึ้นไปในตำแหน่ง supervisor3. มีความรู้เกี่ยวกับระบบคุณภาพ ISO 9001, ISO 14001,ISO 17025,GMP& HACCP4. สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้ดี5. มีความรู้ความสามารถในการใช้คอมพิวเตอร์ได้ดี (Microsoft office, Email, Internet)6. มีทักษะในการบริหารจัดการและมีความเป็นผู้นำ7. มนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดี และมีการถ่ายทอดสื่อสารที่ชัดเจน8. มีสุขภาพแข็งแรง มีความอดทนสามารถเดินทางหรือปฏิบัติงานนอสถานที่ได้9.สามารถทำงานภายใต้สภาวะความกดดันได้ดี มีความรับผิดชอบสูง10. มีความคิดริเริ่มสร้างสรรค์และมีทักษะในก่ารจัดการแก้ปัญหาได้ดี

job_title: R&D Officer/เจ้าหน้าที่วิจัยและพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์ (ประจำโรงงานจังหวัดระนอง)
job_description: คุณสมบัติเพศ: ชาย/หญิงวุฒิการศึกษา: ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิทยาศาสตร์การอาหาร Food Science หรือ สาขาที่เดี่ยวข้อง ประสบการณ์: ถ้ามีประสบการณ์เกี่ยวกับการพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์เครื่องดื่มจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษอื่นๆ: มีความรับผิดชอบ ชอบคิดและพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์ใหม่ๆ ทำงานร่วมกับผู้อื่นได้ดี มีทักษะในการใช้เครื่องมือในlab รายละเอียดงานวิจัยและพัฒนาสูตรผลิตภัณฑ์เครื่องดื่มและผลิตภัณฑ์อื่นๆของบริษัท ตามความต้องการของลูกค้าและนโยบายของบริษัททำงานร่วมกับฝ่ายผลิตเพื่อ ปรับปรุง พัฒนา ควบคุม ผลิตภัณฑ์ปัจจุบัน ให้ดีขึ้นทั้งในด้านคุณภาพ กระบวนการผลิต หรือวัตถุดิบทำงานร่วมกับฝ่ายการตลาด และฝ่ายผลิต เพื่อวิจัย พัฒนาทดลอง ผลิตภัณฑ์ใหม่ป้อนเข้าสู่ตลาดตามความต้องการของลูกค้า พร้อมทำตัวอย่างและคอนเซ็ปต์ของผลิตภัณฑ์ติดต่อสอบถามเพื่อสมัครได้ที่บริษัท วาสนาอดิศรจัมโบ้ จำกัดWassanaadisornJumbo co.,Ltd15หมู่ 3 ถนนเพชรเกษม ตำบลบางริ้น อำเภอเมือง จังหวัดระนอง85000Contact Person :แผนกทรัพยากรบุคคล Tel:(080) 956 6647 Fax (077)816 250

job_title: Aseptic Product Specialist
job_description: Tasks & Responsibilities:Consulting and guidance of sales and customers for the aseptic bottling industryDefinition of performance parameters, dimensioning data etc. as well as verification and adaption of specificationsPresentations and participation in techn. roadshows, fairs, external and internal technical events in Asia/PacificSupport for short term budget price indication and the complete quotation processOrder clarification in collaboration with head quarter and local unitsCreation and adaptation of aseptic presentations for sales with specific customer inquiriesTraining and support for the subsidiaries for all kind of aseptic topicsMarket research within the region Asia Pacific with regard to trends, customers, competitorsRequirements:BachelorDegree in Food Engineering, Microbiology and Engineering3 - 7 years of related work experienceIndependent and goal oriented working style   Fast learning ability and focus on essential aspectsStrong communication skills in English  High level of international mobility If you are interested, please click "Apply Now"KRONES (Thailand) Co., Ltd.39th Floor, InterLink Tower1858/138 Bangna-Trad RoadBangna Sub District, Bangna District Bangkok 10260

job_title: LOGISTICS SPECIALIST - FOOD INGREDIENTS
job_responsibilities: ['Our client isa global manufacturer of food ingredients with an emphasis on confectionary and fat/oil applications for large industries/manufacturers in the global food sector.With annualrevenues exceeding1.2BillionEuros,our client has built up anextensive network of distributors and importers in over 100 countries worldwide.Now, they are seeking an experienced Logistics Professional to take on the following role: LOGISTICS SPECIALIST - FOOD INGREDIENTSSAMUT PRAKARN – FOODUP TO 65K/MONTHTheLogistics Specialist will report to the Operations Manager and be responsible for our client’s order management and supply chain / logistics processes in Thailand. This will involve the following key responsibilities:Facilitate timely issuance of Purchase Orders in accordance with sales planning schedules.Supporting Operations by handling import shipping documents, invoices, packing lists, Bill of Ladings.Be responsibility for sales price calculations and preparation of price lists to facilitate our client’s sales teams selling activitiesEnsures all processes of shipping document for load/unload of shipment, invoicing, claims and any other administration of order handling..Delivery material & spare part to stock.Delivery goods to domestic and international customers.To monitor changes in transportation, shipping law and regulation, GDP, customs and Trade compliance.Manage inventory levels to optimal levels to ensure inventories are maintained.To verify inventory transactions by coordinating with Supply Chain, Accounting, Commercial operation and reconcile inventory report at end of month ']
job_qualifications: ['s:Qualified to degree level, preferably in a Food Science, Arts, or Science or related subject of studyAt least 5 years in import / export / Logistics Management preferably in the food manufacturing sector.Have knowledge in regulation of the Customs Department and BOI will be advantage.Able to operate on Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)Able to work under pressure with positive attitude and service mindsetGood English Communication SkillsExperience in SAPEnglish is minimum requirement: Good verbal and written communications skillsOur client one of the world’s market segment leaders in the confectionary sector with operations throughout the globe that is well known for rewarding its employees with an industry leading pay package that includes performance and sales incentives, car and travel allowances, comprehensive medical insurance and international travel and training opportunities.All interested candidates, please submit your resume stating your present and expected salary and ref. job_title: Quality Assurance Specialist
job_responsibilities: ['Role & Responsibilities:Quality and Food safety systemDeveloping and assessing the HACCP ProgramPlan, organize, direct, assign, delegate, motivate, and review activities of HACCPReview HACCP paperwork ensuring paperwork is complete and accurate.Ensure the facility is following all GMPs and prerequisite programEnsure local quality policies, procedures and practices are comply with corporate, customer, related international standard and regulatory requirements (ex: BRC, ISO, YUM! McD, GMP, HACCP, etc.) Leads pest control program, manage and evaluate the services of sub-contracted serviceManages the facility internal auditing system and verification/ validation activities to ensure RM/PM and product through supply chain meet established company quality and food safety standards Quality system verificationPlans and manages internal audit to ensure the audit program is adopted to verify that Food Safety and QMS conform to planned arrangement. Ensures that evidence of corrective and preventive actions taken are recorded and reviewed. Maintains and updates the recall program, acting as the recall team leader for the facilityLeads and participates in all facility audits including all federal regulatory agencies visits / customer auditTo verify that corrective action plans in place to address any Q&FS non-compliances and that they are being implemented against agreed timescales.Manage current and future relevant co-packers and co-manufacturers to meet global and plant standardRegulatory, religion and import/export complianceEnsure that product and quality system is compliance to Halal and required religionCoordinating, compiling and submitting application documents to the government and other regulatory agencies as required for health certificateGather information and prepare quality & food safety document, provide to domestic/export customer and 3rd party per requestDocument controlManages document system to ensure the procedures are adopted to approve, reviews and update all changes within the scope of Food Safety and QMS.Customer centricityFocusing on quality systems and specification development, including Statistical Process Control analysis of comprehensive analytical and microbiological data. Supports both key raw material and finished goods specifications. Leading or participating in various cross-functional teams in support of the Customer requirement.Leads customer complaints investigation processes, identifies the root causes and ensures the appropriated corrective & preventive actions are taken effectively and timely manner. Analyses trend of complaints based on root cause categories and leads team to minimize complaints.Quality Program improvementIdentify gap analysis, recommendation for improvement actives and enable the improvement of food safety, sanitation, quality and cost saving.Identifying relevant quality-related training needs and delivering training.Manage quality plant scorecardAny other activity allocated by QA Manager from time to time']
job_qualifications: ['s:Male or female, aged 30 - 35 years old.Bachelor’s Degree in Food Science or any related field.Good command of English and computer literateAt least 7 years’ experience being responsible for food quality and food safety,food industrial is preferableBackground in BRC, AIB, FSSC, GMP, HACCP, HALAL, YUM Star, McD SQMS or other food safety standard.Strong analytical and problem solving skills are preferred.Able to articulate ideas well, enjoys problem solving & challenges with positive work attitude and approach. ']

McD, GMP, HACCP, etc.) Leads pest control program, manage and evaluate the services of sub-contracted serviceManages the facility internal auditing system and verification/ validation activities to ensure RM/PM and product through supply chain meet established company quality and food safety standards Quality system verificationPlans and manages internal audit to ensure the audit program is adopted to verify that Food Safety and QMS conform to planned arrangement. Ensures that evidence of corrective and preventive actions taken are recorded and reviewed. Maintains and updates the recall program, acting as the recall team leader for the facilityLeads and participates in all facility audits including all federal regulatory agencies visits / customer auditTo verify that corrective action plans in place to address any Q&FS non-compliances and that they are being implemented against agreed timescales.Manage current and future relevant co-packers and co-manufacturers to meet global and plant standardRegulatory, religion and import/export complianceEnsure that product and quality system is compliance to Halal and required religionCoordinating, compiling and submitting application documents to the government and other regulatory agencies as required for health certificateGather information and prepare quality & food safety document, provide to domestic/export customer and 3rd party per requestDocument controlManages document system to ensure the procedures are adopted to approve, reviews and update all changes within the scope of Food Safety and QMS.Customer centricityFocusing on quality systems and specification development, including Statistical Process Control analysis of comprehensive analytical and microbiological data. Supports both key raw material and finished goods specifications. Leading or participating in various cross-functional teams in support of the Customer requirement.Leads customer complaints investigation processes, identifies the root causes and ensures the appropriated corrective & preventive actions are taken effectively and timely manner. Analyses trend of complaints based on root cause categories and leads team to minimize complaints.Quality Program improvementIdentify gap analysis, recommendation for improvement actives and enable the improvement of food safety, sanitation, quality and cost saving.Identifying relevant quality-related training needs and delivering training.Manage quality plant scorecardAny other activity allocated by QA Manager from time to timeQualifications:Male or female, aged 30 - 35 years old.Bachelor’s Degree in Food Science or any related field.Good command of English and computer literateAt least 7 years’ experience being responsible for food quality and food safety,food industrial is preferableBackground in BRC, AIB, FSSC, GMP, HACCP, HALAL, YUM Star, McD SQMS or other food safety standard.Strong analytical and problem solving skills are preferred.Able to articulate ideas well, enjoys problem solving & challenges with positive work attitude and approach.
